title: 2 Kled bugs.  1 Kled Ult bug, 1 bug Kled Claw vs Akali in shroud interaction

embed.description: First bug: Kled ult causes him to collide into a thin wall, but instead of stopping, his character model stalls for a second then teleports to his ult location. Second bug: Kled's Bear Trap gives vision of Akali inside her W, yet it's not supposed to reveal invisble targets.

body: As title says... I also made a video with slow-motion for clarity of what I said.

replies.body: Q reveals invisible units it hits. so not a bug.
I screwed over a rengar landing my Q on him haha good stuff :P
i dont understand the 2nd bug how is that a bug
